lexUnit.name: canoe.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: travel in or paddle a canoe.

sentence.text: Many years ago the club led a team into the Pyrenees to explore the possibility of wild water rivers in that area and they canoed some very exciting rivers in that region .

I learned to canoe years ago when three of us put borrowed boats in the water at Glasbury and pulled them out , finally , several days later at Tintern , having gone down the Wye .
